hero.name: I'm Yuliia Volodina
hero.textAboutMe: Versatile Senior Frontend / Full-Stack JavaScript Developer with 5+ years of commercial experience building SaaS platforms, AI tools, collaborative editors, real-time applications, Telegram mini-apps, Web3 integrations and high-performance interfaces using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Deno and Node.js.

experience.title: Professional Experience
achievements: Participated in the development of 50+ production applications across SaaS, AI, e-commerce, Web3, gaming and B2B tools.
Worked on multiple SaaS products with authentication, organizations, billing, real-time collaboration and workflow engines.
Contributed to AI image/video generation platforms, LLM workflow automation, Python-based pipelines and multi-model integrations.
Built two admin dashboards from scratch (Bubble Jump & Snake Game), including analytics, moderation and game economy tools.
Developed modules for real-time systems using WebSockets, Socket.IO, Colyseus and Y.js.
Helped design and implement microservice interactions (Deno + RabbitMQ + Redis).

additionalExperience.title: Mentorship & Learning:
additionalExperience.description: For over three years, I've been mentoring developers — from beginners to engineers with commercial experience. I help them take their first steps and grow professionally by solving real-world problems in the JavaScript ecosystem, including React, Next.js, and Vite. Through this work, I've built a community where developers share knowledge, exchange experience, and support one another.

additionalExperience.title: Game Development:
additionalExperience.description: Small indie and experimental projects with focus on gameplay mechanics and interaction. Prototyping ideas and creative coding. Experience with 2D games and browser-based projects, using Canvas and WebGL for visualization.

description: Developed 20+ React/Next.js applications with focus on performance and strong UX.
Built reusable UI components and collaborated with backend teams.
Improved performance, layout structure and accessibility across multiple projects.
Participated in migration from WordPress to a fully custom React frontend.
Built content management tooling and improved site speed.
Delivered two commercial projects (online parts store + corporate website).
Integrated SWR for efficient data fetching and performance boosts.
Worked on frontend architecture for a flight booking platform.
Integrated backend APIs and optimized performance.

experience.summaryDescription: Versatile Senior Frontend / Full-Stack JavaScript Developer with 5+ years of commercial experience. Worked on 50+ projects across SaaS, AI, e-commerce, gaming, workflow tooling, B2B systems and Web3. Strong at UI/UX engineering, clean architecture, scalability, DX, performance optimisation and modern product engineering.

description: Developed Telegram games with integrated animations and optimized logic for mobile devices.
Used Spine for character creation and animations.
Created a Telegram bot for AI-based image generation from text prompts.
Utilized Deno, Grammy to optimize the backend and interact with the Telegram API.
Used Copilot / Copilot Edits, Cursor, Cursor Studio to speed up development and improve code quality.

skillset.title: Tech Stack
skillset.description: Strong expertise across modern frontend and backend technologies, with focus on React, Next.js, TypeScript and real-time systems.

skills.title: Frontend:
skills.value: React 18/19 · Next.js 13/14/15 · TypeScript · TailwindCSS · SCSS Modules · shadcn/ui · Radix · React Router · Framer Motion · Spine WebGL · React Three Fiber · tldraw · Storybook · React Query · Redux · SWR · React Hook Form · Zod · Axios · i18next · SSR/SSG/ISR

skills.title: Backend & APIs:
skills.value: Node.js · Deno · Express.js · Oak · Supabase (Auth, DB, Storage) · Prisma · Drizzle ORM · MongoDB · PostgreSQL · MySQL/MariaDB · Redis (BullMQ, caching, queues) · RabbitMQ (AMQP) · REST APIs · WebSockets · Socket.IO · Colyseus · Stripe · PayPal · OpenAI API · Gemini API · FAL.ai

skills.title: AI / Media Processing:
skills.value: LLM workflows · XLIFF processing · AIMT · AIPE · QA pipelines · Sharp · Canvas · FFmpeg · AI image & video models (FLUX, Gemini, OpenAI, Mistral, LTX Video, WAN, etc.)

skills.title: Game / Web3:
skills.value: Telegram WebApp SDK · Node Telegram Bot API · TON blockchain · TON Connect · 3D RTF (Three.js)

skills.title: DevOps / Infra:
skills.value: Docker · Docker Compose · Nginx · Vercel · Netlify · GitHub Actions · Prometheus · Grafana · Sentry · Terraform (IaC) · AWS S3

mainSkills.title: React
mainSkills.value: Strong knowledge of React 18/19, more than 40 completed projects. Expert in hooks, context, performance optimization and modern patterns.

mainSkills.title: Next.js
mainSkills.value: Confident knowledge of Next.js 13/14/15, 10+ projects implemented. Expert in App Router, Server Components, SSR/SSG/ISR strategies.

mainSkills.title: TypeScript
mainSkills.value: 5+ years of experience. Strong typing, generics, advanced patterns and type-safe API design.

mainSkills.title: Node.js / Deno
mainSkills.value: Full-stack capabilities. Built REST APIs, real-time services, microservices with Express, Oak, BullMQ, Redis, RabbitMQ.

aiCanvas.title: AiCanvas — AI Image & Video Generation Platform
aiCanvas.stack: React 19, Vite 7, Tailwind 4, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Redis/BullMQ, AWS S3, FFmpeg, Y.js, Stripe
contributions: Participated in building core UI for image/video generation & editing (text-to-image, image-to-image).
Worked on real-time collaborative editor using Y.js / Hocuspocus.
Contributed to backend modules: image processing, queues, AI model pipelines.
Integrated AI models (FLUX, OpenAI, Gemini, FAL models).
Helped configure BullMQ queues, media pipelines and SSR rendering.

bubbleJump.title: Bubble Jump — Web3 Telegram Mini-App Game
bubbleJump.stack: Next.js 14, React 18, Socket.IO, MongoDB, Redis, NextAuth, Node Telegram Bot API, OpenAI, PayPal, Docker
contributions: Created the entire admin panel from scratch (React Admin + custom logic).
Worked on gameplay UI, SocialFi quests, inventory, leaderboards.
Integrated real-time mechanics via WebSockets.
Contributed to backend logic (MongoDB, Redis, API Routes).
Integrated AI chat logic (OpenAI).
Participated in Telegram bot development.

snakeGame.title: Snake Game — Real-time Multiplayer Web3 Game (TON)
snakeGame.role: Frontend Developer + Admin Panel + Real-time Integrations
snakeGame.stack: React 18, Three.js, Colyseus, Deno Oak, MongoDB, Redis, TON Connect, Telegram WebApp SDK, Docker, Terraform
contributions: Developed key parts of game UI and 3D rendering logic.
Integrated real-time gameplay via Colyseus.
Integrated TON Wallet & Web3 economy flows.
Built admin panel from scratch (moderation, economy management, analytics).
Helped with Deno backend endpoints and blockchain workflows.

orangeFlow.title: OrangeFlow — Workflow Builder & Project Management System
orangeFlow.stack: React 19, Rete.js, Tailwind, Radix, Deno, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, Redis
contributions: Built modules for project management, teams, and token management.
Developed UI/UX parts of the workflow builder editor.
Integrated with microservices (Gateway, Auth, Workflows, Teams).
Participated in API design and frontend-backend communication.

projects.title: IoT Smart Home
projects.description: Developed a React application for a smart home system, integrating with devices installed around the house. Utilized Firebase for real-time push notifications to alert users of device status changes, enhancing home security and automation.

projects.title: Continent
projects.description: Developed a marketing page for a trading market using Vanilla JavaScript. Integrated APIs to fetch real-time data from market exchanges, providing users with up-to-date information on trading options.

projects.title: Gardens
projects.description: Created a responsive website for a landscaping company based in England using React. Focused on delivering a user-friendly interface to showcase the company's services effectively.

projects.title: Axelar Wrapper
projects.description: Contributed to the development of a secure integration wrapper for the Axelar Network using AssemblyScript. The wrapper supports cross-chain token transfers.

projects.title: DAO Wallet
projects.description: Participated in the development of WebAssembly Web3 wallet, which allows users to interact with decentralized applications (DApps) and allows users to securely manage their cryptocurrency assets and NFT, including sending and receiving transactions.

projects.title: OmniTech
projects.description: Took part in the development of the application a platform to store, index, and provide custom access to cross-chain data. Focused on user interface design.

projects.title: Consider It Done Technologies
projects.description: Designed and implemented a marketing page, utilizing modern UI/UX principles to boost user engagement.

projects.title: DaoSign
projects.description: Participated in the development of a decentralized platform for agreements featuring cryptographic proofs-of-signature, specifically designed for DAOs. Over a period of two years, I contributed to various components, including both the main application and the marketing page. The DAOsign application was built using Next.js and React for the frontend, which facilitated seamless user interactions. It incorporated GraphQL for efficient data handling and urql as a client, providing a robust API communication framework. Key features included the use of Framer Motion for animations and IPFS for secure, decentralized file storage. Security and user authentication were enhanced with Metamask and WalletConnect integrations. The marketing page, which aimed to boost user engagement, was also built using React and Next.js, focusing on modern UI/UX principles.
